data.message:
I would love to go on the Sunday, I would of finished university for Christmas and will be heading home to see my family and friends, and this would be a lovely trip for myself and one of them to go on. I've always wanted to visit the Capital jingle bell ball but the tickets have always ran out extremely fast and the line up is absolutely incredible and I'd feel so lucky to watch the acts perform.
#CAPITALJJB #CapitalFM 💕
